name: Meklord Army Arsenal of Obbligato
text: During your Main Phase: You can activate this effect; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters, also destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon 2 "Meklord Army" monsters from your Deck in Defense Position, except "Meklord Army Arsenal of Obbligato". If this card is sent to the GY: You can activate this effect; during the End Phase of this turn, inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each "Meklord" monster you control. You can only each effect of "Meklord Army Arsenal of Obbligato" once per turn.
